import { useState } from "react" import LatticeVectorsControl from "./LatticeVectorsControl"; import LayerControl from "./LayerControl" export default function ControlColumn(){ const [layers, setLayers] = useState([ { name: "Reflection Layer", hasCrystal: false, ur: 1, er: 1, thickness: 0.0, n: 0.0, material: "", latticeVectors:[] }, { name: "Transmission Layer", hasCrystal: false, ur: 1, er: 1, thickness: 0.0, n: 0.0, material: "", latticeVectors:[] } ]) return(
{layers.map((elem, idx) => )}
) }
